summary: This is an email chain between defense attorney Lloyd Epstein and a federal prosecutor (USANYS) regarding a request to adjourn the criminal case of Allan Guerrero. Epstein requests a one-month adjournment due to Guerrero's recovery from a traffic accident, and the prosecutor consents.

events.title: Adjournment Request for Guerrero Case
events.description: Defense attorney Lloyd Epstein emails a federal prosecutor to request a one-month adjournment of the criminal case against Allan Guerrero, citing Guerrero's ongoing recovery from a bad traffic accident.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain regarding the federal criminal case United States v. Allan Guerrero, Docket No. 14 Cr. 617 (RMB).
Defense attorney Lloyd Epstein requests a one-month adjournment because his client, Allan Guerrero, is still recovering from a bad traffic accident.
A federal prosecutor (with email domain USANYS, likely the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) consents to the adjournment request.
The correspondence is dated September 15, 2016, and shows routine legal scheduling communication.
